title: MSCI Inc.
description: MSCI Inc.'s brand colors are a deep blue (#011B2B) and a vibrant blue (#0626A9), reflecting a combination of professionalism and innovation. These colors are recognized from their official brand guidelines, which can be found at https://www.msci.com/documents/1296102/20547230/MSCI_BrandGuidelines-LogoUsagePortal.pdf.
